events.message: I filed a claim today regarding the car accident I was involved in last night. The collision caused significant damage to the front bumper and hood.
The claim has been reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident as the vehicle was damaged in a collision with another car.
An agent from the claims department has been assigned to handle the accident claim and will reach out soon to provide further assistance.
The insurance company has officially acknowledged receipt of my claim and assured me they will expedite the process for swift resolution.
Requested documents include the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and a copy of my driving license to proceed with the investigation.
I submitted all required documents including the police report and pictures of the carâ€™s damage to support the investigation process.
The claims team has started an investigation to verify the details of the collision and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation into the accident has been completed, establishing that the damage sustained is eligible for coverage under the policy.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on the repair estimate, which covers the costs needed to fix the front-end damage of the vehicle.
I provided feedback expressing my satisfaction with the quick response and clarity provided by the assigned agent during the process.
The claim has been officially approved by the insurance company, confirming that repairs can commence at the authorized service center.
The settlement payment was issued today, covering all repair costs as per the agreed amount detailed in the settlement proposal.
My claim has been closed successfully after payment and repairs were completed to my satisfaction with no outstanding issues.
The documentation and records for my auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance with company policies.
